import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import "../styles/AdminDashboard.css"; function PatientDashboard({ auth, setAuth, onLogout }) { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [showUserDropdown, setShowUserDropdown] = useState(false); const [showProfileModal, setShowProfileModal] = useState(false); const handleLogout = () => { // Use the centralized logout function onLogout(); // Navigate to login page navigate('/'); }; const handleProfileClick = () => { setShowProfileModal(true); setShowUserDropdown(false); }; return (
{/* Header */}

{auth?.user?.name || auth?.username || 'Patient'}
{auth?.role || 'Patient'}
setShowUserDropdown(!showUserDropdown)} > {showUserDropdown && (
Profile
Settings
Sign Out
)}
{/* Main Content */}

🧍‍♂️ Patient Dashboard

Hi {auth?.user?.name || auth?.username}, welcome to your dashboard.

  • 📜 View Prescriptions
  • 📝 Health Records

setShowProfileModal(false)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>

)}

ID: {auth?.user?.id || 'N/A'}
Full Name: {auth?.user?.name || 'N/A'}
Email: {auth?.user?.email || 'N/A'}
Phone: {auth?.user?.phone || 'N/A'}
{auth?.user?.address && (
Address: {auth.user.address}
)} {auth?.user?.dob && (
Date of Birth: {new Date(auth.user.dob).toLocaleDateString()}
)} {auth?.user?.gender && (
Gender: {auth.user.gender}
)}
Role: {auth?.role || 'Patient'}
Status: {auth?.user?.status || 'ACTIVE'}
)}
); } export default PatientDashboard;
